description: nice UI best I've used so far
After few weeks it did not start anymore. Before it was a really nice music player...
/snap/moosync/8/moosync: error while loading shared libraries: libatomic.so.1: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

The connect option in the app opens a URL in a browser with the error: INVALID_CLIENT: Invalid redirect URI. This wouldnt be an issue if you could connect the app normally through the spotify dashboard. There is a field in settings under system for "Spotify Client ID" and "Spotify Client Secret". This is the form of authentication I am used to using to connect spotify clients, but Moosync never gives a redirect URI. Either way I am left with nothing to actually make the application useful. The UI is good and I can reccomend this app as a simple music player, however from the looks of things the developers do not understand how connecting to spotify works ...or they arent updating an outdated URL for pairing.
Perfect dont use spotify use this

This is a great app to finally stop trying popular and legacy linux music apps, they are good but I don't have music in my computer. I like the UI and it is very simple to use. I was able to successfully connect my spotify account so I gives me results from youtube and spotify, it actually pulled my liked songs and playlists also. And it is great having no adds and full control of the playing queue. I followed the steps described here to successfuly connect my account with 2 exceptions: https://moosync.app/wiki/integrations#enabling-spotify-integration
1. Filling all required fields and selecting Web API option
2. Using this URL only in the Redirect URI field "https://moosync.app/spotify"
summary: Best music app I have tried in years

description: Se cieera después de un dialogo que dice Permitir al snap moosync cambiar "default-url-scheme-handler subproperty "moosync a "moosync_moosync.desktop" ? al presionar Si o no

Плеер по интерфейсу очень удобный. Открывается быстро, по вкладкам тоже переключается быстро.
НО! НИодин файл с диска не запустил. Просто ни чего не происходит. Очень жаль
